# Solids
Recipes here are solid items that are created using chemistry.
## Aloe Cream
Aloe Cream can be created by microwaving raw aloe for 10 seconds.
## Crystals
A crystal can be created by combining the following ingredients: - 15 Sugar - 15 Water - 5 Ethanol
## EMP
An EMP blast can be created by combining the following ingredients: - 1 Uranium - 1 Iron - 1 Aluminum
## Foam
A cloud of foam can be created by combining the following ingredients: - 1 Water - 1 Fluorosurfactant
Foam works the same as smoke, holding chems up to the limit it was made with.
## Gunpowder
Gunpowder can be created by combining the following ingredients: - 6 Potassium - 2 Sulfur - 2 Charcoal
## Plastic
10 Plastic Can be created by combining the following ingredients: - 10 Oil - 6 Ash - 4 Sulfuric Acid - Heating the solution to 374 degrees
## Regenerative Mesh
Meshes can be created by microwaving the following ingredients for 10 seconds:
- 1 Raw Aloe - 1 Ointment - 1 Cloth - 20 units of Sigynate - 20 units of Dermaline
## Smoke
A cloud of smoke can be created by combining the following ingredients: - 1 Sugar - 1 Potassium - 1 Phosphorus
Smoke carries any extra chems in its reaction medium up to the amount of smoke you make, for example;
a 5-5-5 mix can carry 5u of mutagen and pass it onto anyone who enteres the smoke cloud.
## Suture
Sutures can be created by microwaving the following ingredients for 10 seconds:
- 1 Poppy - 1 Brute Pack - 1 Cloth - 20 units of Tranexamic Acid - 20 units of Cryptobiolin
